achievements.title: SignGuard: FL Security Educational Implementation
achievements.description: Educational implementation demonstrating how ECDSA signatures can be combined with anomaly detection and reputation scoring to protect federated learning systems from poisoning attacks. This is a learning project implementing established research techniques, not novel research.

metrics.note: Educational implementation - demonstrates understanding of FL security concepts

comparison.baseline: Combines established techniques: ECDSA signatures for authentication, statistical anomaly detection, and reputation-weighted aggregation

achievements.title: FL Security Research Portfolio
achievements.description: Completed comprehensive 31-project research portfolio on federated learning security with 137,770+ lines of production code.

achievements.title: FedPhish: Privacy-Preserving Phishing Detection
achievements.description: 21-project portfolio on federated phishing detection with homomorphic encryption, TEE, and zero-knowledge proofs.

metrics.note: Guard-GBDT experiments show 81.56% accuracy with Îµ=1.0 differential privacy (see results.md in repository)

achievements.demoNote: Demo deployment in progress - see repository for setup instructions

achievements.title: Enterprise AI Systems Portfolio
achievements.description: 10-project production-grade portfolio featuring RAG systems, LangGraph agents, and LLMOps pipelines.
systems: LangGraph Agents: Customer support, fraud triage, ad insights

achievements.title: Published Steganography Research
achievements.description: Research on PVD+LSB+Modulo encoding published in Springer LNNS volume 285.

achievements.title: Fraudware Analyzer: Static Analysis Framework
achievements.description: Banking trojan detection framework using static analysis and YARA rules.
